summary.content: I’ve discovered a nifty little MT plug-in called “Acronym”. It takes many of the common acronyms and abbreviations and gives them a keen little description that is visible on mouseover. Some of the more common ones are CSS, XHTML, W3C, IE, NS7, IE5/Mac, and US 508. Actually, it’s just my way of testing out what this plug-in can do, and what it can’t…

content.source:
I’ve discovered a nifty little MT plug-in called [“Acronym”]({{% wayback "http://mt-plugins.org/archives/entry/acronym.php" %}}). It takes many of the common acronyms and abbreviations and gives them a keen little description that is visible on mouseover.

Some of the more common ones are CSS, XHTML, W3C, IE, NS7, IE5/Mac, and US 508. Actually, it’s just my way of testing out what this plug-in can do, and what it can’t…
